title: Ticket #4935: Our core file and error string detection was not working well
description: We had a case where on a half a dozen platforms, the negotiator would drop a core on exit. There were a number of issues. One we were checking before we kill the personal HTCondor being used. Additionally if we had a test with multiple personal HTCoondors only a detection in the last one checked would triger an error. Quite a fee small changes to fix the timing and improve our detecting position.
check_ins: 2015-Mar-13 08:35   Check-in [43571]: This is more working though cyqwin removal #4862 #4935 plus reworking the timings surrounding our core and ERROR detectiong code in the tests. (By Bill Taylor )
creator: bt
